backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user profiles with authorization checks and full CRUD operations for offers stored in maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature-evidence report mapping product features to supporting frontend files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for numerous frontend components, pages, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file mounting the React app and loading the main module script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes wrapped in SiteLayout and integrates theme provider and admin-protected routes.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Route guard that enforces admin authentication using Internet Identity and role checks with fallback UI states.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button for login/logout via Internet Identity with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/cta/FloatingCont: Floating WhatsApp and phone call action buttons with tooltips for quick customer contact.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders a footer with store info, quick links, category links, and a dynamic copyright plus referral link.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderNav: Implements the site header with navigation links, admin controls, login button, and a mobile slide-out menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Wraps pages with header, footer, and floating contact CTAs inside a full-height layout.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Catego: Displays a category card with an image, title, and description using a responsive image component.
Provides quick category navigation buttons with icons that redirect users to the categories page.
frontend/src/components/marketing/TrustI: Shows a set of trust indicator cards highlighting quality, pricing, and local convenience.
frontend/src/components/marketing/WhyCho: Displays a multi-card section outlining reasons to shop at the store with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/media/Responsive: A wrapper around img that supports lazy loading, priority loading, and optional aspect ratio styling.
frontend/src/components/offers/OfferCard: Shows an offer card with title, description, discount badge, and validity dates formatted from bigint timestamps.
frontend/src/components/offers/OfferEdit: Provides a dialog form for creating or editing offers with validation and date handling.
frontend/src/components/seo/Seo.tsx: Dynamically sets page SEO metadata and optionally injects structured JSON-LD data for the store.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useCallerRole.ts: Fetches and exposes the caller's admin role status using a backend actor and React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/offers/useActiveOffer: Retrieves the list of active offers from the backend actor using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/offers/useAdminOffers: Provides React Query hooks to fetch, create, update, delete, and toggle offers using the authenticated actor and invalidates related queries on mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context with login, logout, and identity loading via Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, theme variables, dark mode settings, typography, and custom animation utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with SEO metadata, hero section, story content, and values grid.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOffersPage: Admin interface for creating, editing, toggling, and deleting promotional offers. Uses dialogs, tables, and mutation hooks for offer management with toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/CategoriesPage.tsx: Displays the product categories page with SEO metadata, a hero section, category grid, and additional info section.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders the store contact page with SEO metadata, address, hours, phone info, and an embedded Google Map. Uses cards and layout sections for contact details and directions.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the homepage with hero content, category links, trust indicators, and promotional sections. Includes SEO setup and navigation to categories and offers.
frontend/src/pages/OffersPage.tsx: Displays active offers with loading, error, and empty states, plus promotional messaging and a banner. Fetches offers via a custom hook and renders them using OfferCard components.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing parameters from URLs. Supports both standard and hashâ€‘based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom colors, container settings, extended fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines project state, requirements, architectural notes, image needs, and implemented features for building a responsive marketing website for IN2 Supermart.
